The critical angle (θc) for total internal reflection is given by sin(θc) = 1/sqrt(2) ≈ 0.707, therefore θc = 45°.
Since the angle of incidence at CD (45°) is equal to the critical angle (45°), the light will undergo total internal reflection.
The refraction angle when the light enters the prism is 30°, and the light cannot exit from edge CD.
